665210.name: Hoop Shot VR
665210.description:
Basketball like never before in VR!

Shoot hoops and experience a whole new dimension of basketball in this quirky VR basketball game.

See yourself in real time on the jumbo screen and experience the excitement as the crowd jumps at your amazing ball shooting skills.

Practice and hone your talents on the court on the regulation basketball size court, score three pointers like never before.

So jump in, relax and enjoy a game of basketball in VR.

This game supports HTC Vive.

Features

    Full Regulation Size Basket Ball Court
    Cheer Leaders
    Jumbo Screen
    Arcade Mode
665210.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
